title: Dhagudu Dhattham lyrics Manmadhan Ambu songs lyrics
stanzas:
Pona pogudhunu viteena
Canennu aappu vapaanda
Thaana thedi poi ninyana
Venunu kaaka vappaanda

[Saama thaana vedha dhandam
Naalum korthu pogum podhu
Dhagudu Dhattham say
Dhagudu Dhattham say
Dhagudu Dhattham ] (2)

Dei panakaara saami thinnum dhaanam pannura
Adei panakaara veera-vaaka car-il poiyu veram pannura
Thappaana aalu edhilum vellum
Yeda koodam
Yepodhum illai kaalam marum
Gnyayam vellum.

Saama thaana vedha dhandam
Naalum korthu pogum podhu
Dhagudu Dhattham say
Dhagudu Dhattham say
Dhagudu Dhattham

Pona pogudhunu viteena
Canennu aappu vapaanda
Thaana thedi poi ninyana
Venunu kaaka vappaanda

Hey.. Nallavanu yaara solla
Kettavanu yaara solla
Nallavana kettavana mathuravandhan kettavano
Automatic watch pola odugira vazhkai idhu
Aaturavan niruthiputa nadunisila ninidum-doi

yeeee en nanba
Vazhkai enbadhu varusa kadaisi pariksha pola da
Kel pudhu venba
Un kannil thova katra kaiman vezhiku aagudhada

Saama thaana vedha dhandam
Naalum korthu pogum podhu
Dhagudu Dhattham say
Dhagudu Dhattham say
Dhagudu Dhattham

Ohh.. Mallukatti Mallukatti
Malanu ponadhunna
pillukattu kaasukaga etukatti solurenda
kannuketu ponadhunna
Suriyana kumbiduran
sathyatha kalavu seiya sakidaya thediduvan

Peranbe...
Nee tharavarthu vera aalu kaiyil serthuta
kaman ambe
nee kuriya maathi vera nenjil kutha vachita

Saama thaana vedha dhandam
Naalum korthu pogum podhu
Dhagudu Dhattham say
Dhagudu Dhattham say
Dhagudu Dhattham

oda thechu vela senjalum
Oru paisa kooti thandhana...
Madaa olachi verthu ninaalum
Vairu-aara soru vachaana ..

seo.title: Dhagudu Dhattham lyrics Manmadhan Ambu songs lyrics
seo.description: Get the complete Dhagudu Dhattham lyrics Manmadhan Ambu songs lyrics from Manmadhan Ambu. Read the lyrics penned by Kamal Haasan and composed by Devi Sri Prasad(DSP) and sung by Kamal Haasan. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Kamal Haasan, Manmadhan Ambu, Devi Sri Prasad(DSP), Kamal Haasan, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
